name: Video Media Productions
overview: VMP offers a full range of professional production services. In business for over 35 years producing Corporate communication videos for Business. As well as Television shows for over 21 years including : In 2000 - Party Thyme Karaoke ( Your a Star) the pilot series that later become known as AMERICAN IDOL. House Party USA, Thump TV, Arizona Republic Sports Show. AM Magazine, and “The Health Discovery Network ,are among the shows we produced. We also produced for many Network shows including Montel Williams , 20/20, Entertainment Tonight, HBO, CBS Nightly News, PM Magazine, NFL Super Bowl and other nations news programs for CNN , CBS, NBC and the Weather Channel. At VIDEO MEDIA PRODUCTIONS we specialize in getting results for our clients. Through the years we have created hundreds of successful advertising campaigns and purchased millions of dollars in media for our clients. From regional and national commercials to motion picture production, we can assist you in every area of your project.
